mapper.select:
SELECT a.record_id AS recordId, a.assets_id AS assetsId, b.assets_name AS assetsName, a.work_capacity AS workCapacity, a.work_gross_unit AS workGrossUnit, a.depre_amount AS depreAmount, DATE_FORMAT(a.cal_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS calTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.cal_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS calTimeStr, c.depre_type_name AS deperTypeName FROM admin_depre_record a, admin_fixed_assets b, admin_depre_type c WHERE a.assets_id = b.assets_id AND c.depre_type_id = b.depre_type_id AND a.alive_flag = '1' AND b.alive_flag = '1'
AND b.assets_name LIKE ('${assetsName}')
AND a.cal_time >= STR_TO_DATE(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d') AND a.cal_time <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
ORDER BY ${sort} ${order}
SELECT MAX(cal_time) AS calTime FROM admin_depre_record WHERE assets_id = #{assetsId}
